Reduces read/write operations lightweight efficient caching system. Offers centralized system features, task queues. Provides fast data transformation Redis data.table. Simplifies local worker setup processx. Enables scaling large remote worker networks via mirai package. Automatically detects recovers worker failures high reliability.
